name: Adrift (mogan42)
description:
In Adrift you play as a character making their way through the wasteland of earth past. 

Be careful as your health is shared between yourself and the little pink friend that you find on your journey.

You must manage protecting your pink friend from the bad guys while dealing with the bad guys targeting you!! But don't stray too far from your friend or new enemies will spawn to kill your pink friend and subsequently YOU!!

Played best on an Xbox controller

This game was made in 4 weeks as a student project for AIE Adelaide.

There is no music or sound in this game because of time pressures

Art, Code and Design by : Morgan Davies
